message: Hello Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $15000. This price reflects the quality and potential of the product.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider this price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget constraints. However, $10000 doesn't reflect the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down to $12500 to make this deal work. It's a significant reduction from my initial offer, but it still allows me to earn a fair price for the product. Let me know if this works for you.

I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but $12500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll make an offer of $11250. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price
